modName: Replacer Visuals for Spell Effects - SkyRe Patch
descriptionHtml:
Vysh's mod has some really nice shader effects for the Mage Armor spells, but since I use SkyRe, the effects were being overriden. This mod basically lets you have the spell's stats from SkyRe and the eye candy from the new effects at the same time :D

Mod's needed, obviously:
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15625]Alternate Visuals for Spell Effects[/url] (REPLACER VERSION)

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/9286/]SkyRe[/url]

Credits:
Vysh, for the Alternate Visuals for Spell Effects mod
T3ndo, for making SkyRe
author: Yoshh

files.name: Replcaer Visuals for Spell Effects - SkyRe Patch
